comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This photograph was taken in 1945. H.M.S. Arbiter visited Sydney three times. 1. 2 to 15 May 1945. 2. 15 to 19 September 1945. 3. 26 October to late November 1945. [ ref. www.royalnavyresearcharchive.org.uk/ESCORT/ARBITER.htm ]

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
We have amended the dates on all the images you suggested.
Thank you for all your help with dating our images.
